hanuman_stotras.name: Hanuman Chalisa
hanuman_stotras.author: Goswami Tulsidas
hanuman_stotras.description: The most popular hymn dedicated to Lord Hanuman, praising his strength, devotion, wisdom, and his service to Lord Rama.
benefits: Removes fear, obstacles, and negative energies
hanuman_stotras.key_excerpt: जय हनुमान ज्ञान गुन सागर । जय कपीस तिहुँ लोक उजागर ॥

hanuman_stotras.name: Hanuman Ashtak
hanuman_stotras.author: Tulsidas
hanuman_stotras.description: A devotional composition describing Hanuman’s heroic acts and divine protection.
hanuman_stotras.key_excerpt: बाल समय रबि भक्षि लियो तब, तीनहुं लोक भयो अंधियारो

hanuman_stotras.name: Bajrang Baan
hanuman_stotras.author: Tulsidas
hanuman_stotras.description: A powerful invocation hymn calling Hanuman to destroy evil forces and obstacles.
benefits: Immediate relief from fear and danger
hanuman_stotras.key_excerpt: जय हनुमंत संत हितकारी । सुनि लीजै प्रभु अरज हमारी ॥

hanuman_stotras.name: Hanuman Kavach
hanuman_stotras.description: A set of verses invoking Hanuman's divine protection for different parts of the body.
benefits: Removes fear of ghosts, black magic, negative energies

sections.body_protection: Protection of head, heart, limbs, senses

hanuman_stotras.name: Hanuman Ashtottara Shatanamavali
hanuman_stotras.description: A list of Hanuman’s 108 names representing his strength, virtues, and divine qualities.

hanuman_stotras.name: Hanuman Bahuk
hanuman_stotras.author: Tulsidas
hanuman_stotras.description: A devotional prayer believed to have been composed by Tulsidas to cure his arm ailment through Hanuman’s grace.

hanuman_stotras.name: Sankat Mochan Hanuman Stotra
hanuman_stotras.author: Goswami Tulsidas
hanuman_stotras.description: A prayer describing Hanuman’s various rescues of devotees from danger.

hanuman_stotras.name: Hanuman Dwadasha Nama Stotram
hanuman_stotras.description: A simple stotra containing 12 powerful names of Lord Hanuman.
benefits: Short and effective for daily chanting

hanuman_stotras.name: Anjaneya Stotram
hanuman_stotras.author: Adi Shankaracharya
hanuman_stotras.description: A hymn by Shankaracharya describing the divine form and nature of Hanuman.

hanuman_stotras.name: Maruti Stotra
hanuman_stotras.author: Samarth Ramdas
hanuman_stotras.description: A powerful Marathi stotra praising Hanuman as the embodiment of strength and discipline.
